argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hhnv.1 | |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. |
| 2 |  | #P_hilablo | |- +h e. AbelOp |
| 3 |  | #P_ablogrpo | |- ( +h e. AbelOp -> +h e. GrpOp ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- +h e. GrpOp |
| 5 |  | #P_ax-hfvadd | |- +h : ( ~H X. ~H ) --> ~H |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fdmi | |- dom +h = ( ~H X. ~H ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_grporn | |- ~H = ran +h |
| 8 |  | #P_hilid | |- ( GId ` +h ) = 0h |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqcomi | |- 0h = ( GId ` +h ) |
| 10 |  | #P_hilvc | |- <. +h , .h >. e. CVecOLD |
| 11 |  | #P_normf | |- normh : ~H --> RR |
| 12 |  | #P_norm-i | |- ( x e. ~H -> ( ( normh ` x ) = 0 <-> x = 0h ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ ( normh ` x ) = 0 ) -> x = 0h ) |
| 14 |  | #P_norm-iii | |- ( ( y e. CC /\ x e. ~H ) -> ( normh ` ( y .h x ) ) = ( ( abs ` y ) x. ( normh ` x ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_norm-ii | |- ( ( x e. ~H /\ y e. ~H ) -> ( normh ` ( x +h y ) ) <_ ( ( normh ` x ) + ( normh ` y ) ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 9, 10, 11, 13, 14, 15, 1 | #P_isnvi | |- U e. NrmCVec |
